text: Heinrich Joseph Maximilian Johann Maria von Brentano di Tremezzo (20 June 1904 â€“ 14 November 1964), known professionally as Heinrich von Brentano, was a German politician of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU). He was the Federal Minister for Foreign Affairs from 1955 to 1961. ==Honors== * Grand Cross of the Order of Christ, Portugal (10 April 1958) ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Foreign ministers of Germany Category:Politicians from Frankfurt Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer
title: Heinrich von Brentano
